name: Crypto Brains - Crypto Trading Application UI Kit
description:
Hey guys! Here's my new hit on Figma.

I'm working on a cryptocurrency exchange right now. I'll show you one of the concepts I provided for this project (I usually do 2-4 style solutions for the first screen example)

It was necessary to make a clean and laconic design because this site is for daily use by investors and traders. I have a lot of work in front of me, i think we will have great product which will be a direct competitor to Binance.

Thanx for watching Your likes‚ù§ and comments are really helped me
